targets.query:
SELECT integral("value") /3600000 FROM "pvPower" 
WHERE "value"::field < $peakPowerLimit
              AND ("id"::tag = '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("value") /3600000 FROM "pvPower" 
WHERE "value"::field < $peakPowerLimit
              AND ("id"::tag <> '') 
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1d), "id"::tag fill(none)  tz('$timezone')

SELECT max("value") FROM "pvPower" 
WHERE "value"::field < $peakPowerLimit
              AND ("id"::tag = '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')

SELECT max("value") FROM "pvPower" 
WHERE "value"::field < $peakPowerLimit
              AND ("id"::tag <> '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1m), "id"::tag fill(none)  tz('$timezone')

SELECT last("value") FROM "batterySoc" 
WHERE ("id"::tag = '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')

SELECT last("value") FROM "batterySoc" 
WHERE ("id"::tag <> '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1d), "id"::tag fill(none)  tz('$timezone')

SELECT last("value") FROM "batteryPower" 
WHERE ("id"::tag = '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')

SELECT last("value") FROM "batteryPower" 
WHERE ("id"::tag <> '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1m), "id"::tag fill(none)  tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "tariffGrid" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("value") FROM "tariffGrid" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')
SELECT min("value") FROM "tariffGrid" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value") FROM "tariffGrid" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time($energySampleInterval) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value") FROM "tariffGrid" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time($energySampleInterval) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value") FROM "tariffFeedIn" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time($energySampleInterval) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value") FROM "tariffGrid" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time($energySampleInterval) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value") FROM "tariffFeedIn" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time($energySampleInterval) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT integral("value") / 3600000 FROM "tariffSolar" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')

SELECT integral("subquery") / 3600000 FROM (SELECT max("value") AS "subquery" FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 AND value < $peakPowerLimit AND ("id"::tag = '') GROUP BY time($energySampleInterval) fill(0) tz('$timezone')) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)  tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "tariffSolar" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')

SELECT max("value") FROM "pvPower" 
WHERE "value"::field < $peakPowerLimit
              AND ("id"::tag = '')
              AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "tariffCo2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("value") FROM "tariffCo2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')
SELECT min("value") FROM "tariffCo2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value") FROM "tariffCo2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time($energySampleInterval) fill(0) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("l1") FROM "gridCurrents" WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("l2") FROM "gridCurrents" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l3") FROM "gridCurrents" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l1") FROM "gridCurrents" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l2") FROM "gridCurrents" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l3") FROM "gridCurrents" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("l1") FROM "gridPowers" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("l2") FROM "gridPowers" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("l3") FROM "gridPowers" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l1") FROM "gridPowers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("l2") FROM "gridPowers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("l3") FROM "gridPowers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT last("l1") FROM "chargeCurrents" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("l2") FROM "chargeCurrents" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("l3") FROM "chargeCurrents" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT last("value") FROM "chargeCurrent" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l1") FROM "chargeCurrents" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l2") FROM "chargeCurrents" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("l3") FROM "chargeCurrents" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT mean("value") FROM "chargeCurrent" WHERE ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "phasesActive" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND value = 1 GROUP BY time(1m), "loadpoint"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "phasesActive" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') AND value = 3 GROUP BY time(1m), "loadpoint"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("loadpoint"::tag = '$loadpoint') GROUP BY time(1m), "loadpoint"::tag fill(none) tz('$timezone')

list.description: Zeitzone: TZ Identifier wie hier gelistet: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List
list.label: Zeitzone
list.name: timezone

list.description: Grenze der maximalen Leistung in W, über diese hinaus Leistungswerte als Ausreißer ignoriert werden.
list.label: Filter für maximale Leistung / W
list.name: peakPowerLimit

list.description:
Liste der Loadpoints, die NICHT angezeigt werden sollen. Der Ausdruck ist eine reguläre Expression, die mit / anfangen und mit / enden muss. Sie darf nicht leer sein, wenn also nichts gefiltert werden sollte, muss hier eine reguläre Expression stehen, die keinen der Einträge matched.

Beispiele:
Keine Einträge: /^none$/
Filtere 'Garage' aus: /^Garage$/
Filtere 'Garage' und 'Stellplatz' aus: /^Garage$|^Stellplatz$/
Filtere alles, das mit 'foo' beginnt aus: /^foo.*$/
list.label: Blacklist für Loadpoints
list.name: loadpointBlacklist

list.definition: show tag values from chargePower with key = "loadpoint" where "loadpoint" !~ $loadpointBlacklist
list.label: Ladepunkt
list.name: loadpoint

query.query: show tag values from chargePower with key = "loadpoint" where "loadpoint" !~ $loadpointBlacklist

list.description: Das Abtastinterval für die Energieberechnung. Sollte mindestens 2x dem Abfrageintervall von EVCC entsprechen. Default: 60s, da das Default Intervall von EVCC 60s beträgt.
list.label: Energie Abtast Interval
list.name: energySampleInterval
